com.barryholroyd.productlisttechdemo.support

Class Toaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.productlisttechdemo.support.Toaster

  • public class Toaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to display toasts.

    Each successive toast is positioned slightly below the previous toast; after five toasts, it starts from the top again.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int offset
      Current offset from the top position.
      private static int YINC
      Distance in pixels between top edge of successive toasts.
      private static int YMAX
      Maximum distance to offset before restarting at the top again.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public static void display(java.lang.ref.WeakReference<android.app.Activity> wrActivity,
                           java.lang.String msg)
        Display a pop-up message to the user.

        This can be called from either the foreground or the background. A weak reference is used for the Activity parameter so that we can avoid using an Activity which has gone away.

        Parameters:
        wrActivity - weak reference for the calling activity.
        msg - message to be displayed.
